directions: Fill a chilled cocktail shaker 3/4-full with ice; add gin, orange aperitif, vermouth, and simple syrup and stir. Strain drink into a martini glass.
Squeeze the orange peel over the drink and drop into the glass.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce bitter orange aperitif (such as Campari®)
title: Negroni Dolce Cocktail
